title: Blue Heelers
brief_description: Blue Heelers is an Australian police drama series which depicted the lives of police officers stationed at the fictional Mount Thomas police station in a small town in Victoria.

constellations_other.name: Australian TV in the 1990s
constellations_other.description: In the 1990s, Australians and Australian culture was changing: so too were the representations of it on television.

description: Blue Heelers is an Australian police drama series that depicted the lives of police officers stationed at the fictional Mount Thomas police station in a small town in Victoria.
